value:
So, you're saying I came bursting out
of that divine weapon? That must
make bolstering your ranks a cinch!$k$pJust goes to show I can't
underestimate Summoners from
other worlds!

I don't have many memories from
before coming here. Doesn't bother
me one bit, though!

Oh, it's you on patrol duty today? Uh,
in that case... Well, I overheard that
somebody may have...$k$pDug a pitfall on the patrol route. So,
um... Be careful out there, OK?

Any chance you'd share some of your
strategies with me?$k$pI've just gotta know what's floating
around the mind of the master
tactician of the Order of Heroes!

Being the daughter of a brilliant
tactician, I can take on a ton of
different jobs!$k$pCheck me out! I'm a Dark Flier right
now.

Ha! My plan to show up out of the
blue and get you to talk to me
worked like a charm!$k$pHeehee, I'm here to say hello from
your friend $Nf.

Whew... I'm catching up quick as
I can, Father!

Nice! Getting stronger, one step
at a time!

This failure will haunt me for the
rest of my life.

This is just like that time I got a
new tactics book from my father!

My name's Morgan. If you've been
looking for the daughter of the genius
tactician Robin, look no further!$k$pMy father is somewhere here as well,
yes?

$Nu... I have a
huge request for you today...
Please...$k$pMake me your apprentice!$k$pYour strategies are so wonderful, you
could almost rival my father!$k$pAnd he's a genius tactician, as I may
have mentioned five or six times
already...$k$pI'll even do odd jobs! I'll wash your
robe, I'll polish the Breidablik,
anything you ask!$k$pReally?! I can be your apprentice?!
Oh, thank you so much! I'm going to
learn so much from you!$k$pHeehee... There's something about
your smile that reminds me of my
father, actually... It's kind.$k$pEver since we first met, I just knew I
had to follow your lead.$k$pEven without this Summoner-Hero
relationship, I'm sure we would have
been just as close!$k$pAnyway, I hope I can follow you
right to the very end!
えいっ！
Here I go!
ひゃあっ！
I messed up...
Checkmate!
Amateur.
Wait 'til you see this!
My turn!
Tough one...
Eheehee
My father is the greatest tactician who's ever lived, you know.
A blow to the head from a big tome is no joke, let me tell you.
Up for a game of chess?
Give me time, and I'll be your best piece on the board.
You wouldn't know it to look at me, but I have almost total amnesia!
Someday, I hope to be able to beat my father in tactics...
I like it here with you. I hope you find my strategies useful!
OK.
What's next?
Let's go!
